markdownRemark.html: This is one of Marbella’s most exclusive golf courses. This is a nice course set in the natural surrounding hills. Some very tough holes but overall very good. The course has wide fairways, medium sized greens and almost no rough to speak of. It also has its own version of an ‘Amen corner’ - Santa Clara Corner - a long downhill par four followed by a 200 yard+ par three and finishing off with a 600 yard par 5. Finish your round with a beer in the spectacular Club house, sit on the terrace and reflect where those six shot went that could have made you the winner on the day.

frontmatter.title: Santa Clara Golf Club Marbella
frontmatter.description: Santa Clara Golf Club Marbella - This is one of Marbella’s most exclusive golf courses. This is a nice course set in the natural surrounding hills. Some very tough holes but overall very good. The course has wide fairways, medium sized greens and almost no rough to speak of. It also has its own version of an ‘Amen corner’ - Santa Clara Corner - a long downhill par four followed by a 200 yard+ par three and finishing off with a 600 yard par 5. Finish your round with a beer in the spectacular Club house, sit on the terrace and reflect where those six shot went that could have made you the winner on the day.
frontmatter.address: Ctra. N-340 Málaga-Cádiz km 187.5, 29603 Marbella, Málaga, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 65.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 65.00 euros
tags: Top golf courses Costa del Sol
